submission:
class Solution(object):
    def minimumOperations(self, nums, target):
        """
        :type nums: List[int]
        :type target: List[int]
        :rtype: int
        """
        n = len(nums)
        v = [0] * n
        for i in range(n):
            v[i] = target[i] - nums[i]
        
        res = 0
        rr = 0
        pos = 0
        res = abs(v[0])
        rr = res
        if v[0] >= 0:
            pos = 1
        
        for i in range(1, n):
            if v[i] >= 0 and pos == 0:
                res += abs(v[i])
                rr = abs(v[i])
                pos = 1
                
            elif v[i] < 0 and pos == 1:
                res += abs(v[i])
                rr = abs(v[i])
                pos = 0
                
            elif rr >= abs(v[i]):
                rr = abs(v[i]) 
                continue       
            else:
                res += abs(v[i]) - rr
                rr = abs(v[i])
        
        return res
